attributes.action: stop this madness that is petrol pricing. you tax the motorist more than any one else plus all the fines and cameras. either drop the petrol tax or put it back into the motorists such as improved road infastructures, higher motorway speeds. you keep hitting us this hard and well hit back dont you worry!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
